name: Alternator: Tactical Stealth Operations
description:
Click here to download & discuss demo

It's an unique era; an era where computation and size of storage is no longer the limitation. The world is mechanical to quantum.

Application of Quantum Mechanics in living beings for civilised military warfare. Microbes control microchips, bacteria drives electricity. The world is cyclic and never ending. You are to experience the test of Brahman, who you can meet only if you make it till the end.

The era is where humans are with laws of nature, where vehicles, robotics, etc do not pollute the environment. It's pre- Mahābhārata era. KEY FEATURES

  • Vast Environments: The game world takes you through forests, snow, deserts and buildings like robotics lab.
  • Game Mechanics: Solve mysteries, hunt animals, hack machines, avoid traps. The world is mechanical to quantum.
  • Unique Bosses: Each boss is a concept of its own. Each boss has its own mechanics which must be figured out to be defeated.
